title: Wo Long: Fallen Dynasty Review Round-Up - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.02.23
description:
Go to http://hellofresh.com/kindafunny65 and use code kindafunny65 for 65% off plus free shipping!

Watch the new episode of The Blessing Show, breaking down what’s up with Black Hair in Video Games: https://youtu.be/pepkcF9UXng

Fran Mirabella returns to KFGD to talk to Tim about Wo Long Fallen Dynasty, Mario Day, Dead By Daylight, and more!

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:02:56 - Housekeeping
Over on Patreon we have a brand new heated episode of Kinda Feudy, an episode of the Shit List where we react to IGN’s top 10 fighting games, and an upcoming episode of the Kinda Funny Next Gen podcast where me, Barrett, and Roger detail a crazy night out. Catch all of those on Patreon.com/KindaFunny
Of course there’s a new episode of The Blessing Show you can check out right now. Youtube.com/KindaFunnyGames
